title: BLACK+DECKER Digital Microwave Oven with Turntable Push-Button Door, Child Safety Lock, Stainless Steel, 0.9 Cu Ft
description: This professional-style Black + Decker 0.9 Cubic Foot 900 Watt Stainless Steel Microwave features 10 power levels, removable glass turntable and a spacious interior. Advanced technology provides even heating and defrosting for great results without overcooking. Optimally cook or reheat six of the most popular food items with the touch of a button. Choose power levels up to 900 watts. The large LED digital display has a clock function and can also display a countdown timer as well as the cooking time remaining.
